title: [1.5.2~1.5.1][ssp/smp][汉化]魔典:盖亚2(GrimoireofGaia2)1.5.0
author: yuningning520
txt_content:
本帖最后由 yuningning520 于 2014-3-11 10:45 编辑 

之前那位(http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=104904 )的版本经常崩溃
所以去原帖下载最新版
服里投票汉化
所以就这样了

ps 认真看了那位汉化后我无力吐槽,所以怪物名字重新汉化一遍
ps 150更新加了一些日系怪物,名字翻译那个难...日系英语都是音译的有木有!中系英语都是无视语法的有木有!
(1.3.0中的"Jiang Shi"...)

下载http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... 153&pid=2640616

replies.author: wolski
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 wolski 于 2013-7-23 06:32 编辑 

啊 152弄好了，基本是在LZ汉化基础上改的，所以就不开新帖了........ 
新增几个物品，部分BUFF格式有变动而已，游戏内的改动还没看，建议还是更新152吧，改动非常多

Version 1.5.2 (1.5.2) Release Added Forge Biome Dictionary Support
Now works with mods which support the Biome Dictionary

Items:
General:
Added Element of Water, Fiery Soul and SoulfireRenamed duration of Enchanted Items
removed "for"

Specific:
Ancient Scroll of Repair replaced with Ancient Repair Hammer
Ancient Repair Hammer can now repair damaged Anvils
Blaze Stave now converts Ender Pearls to Blaze Rods in crafting
Durability -45
Ender Stave now converts Blaze Rods to Ender Pearls in crafting
Durability -45
Mandrake now inflicts Nausea for (0:20)Mandrake Stew can now only be consumed once
Recovers 4 heartsRestores 4 Hunger0.8 SaturationAlways Edible
Mandrake Stew buff increased:
Night Vision for (3:00)Water Breathing for (3:00)
Meat saturation reduced to 0.8Meat Stew can now be made of (4) Meat Morsel and a Poisonous PotatoMeat Stew now only recovers 2 Hunger
Meat Stew now has 0.8 Saturation per consumption
Ornate Fire Fan now requires Fiery Soul to be repaired instead of CoalOrnate Ice Fan now requires Soulfire to be repaired instead of Snowball

Mobs:
Specific:
Bone Knight spawn height increased to (20Y)Chochin-Obake health reduced by 20Cyan Flower death animation removedCyan Flower shadow removedCyan Flower can be given Element of Water
30% to obtain a Mandrake in exchange
Creep increased default spawn rate (+2)Dryad now obtains Slowness and Weakness for (0:05) when on fireEnder Eye increased default spawn rate (+2)Flesh Lich spawn height increased to (20Y)Flesh Lich health reduced by 20Garden Gnome trade table reconfigured:
Garden Gnome no longer trades Emeralds/Emerald Shards or Combat Book
Garden Gnome now converts (1) Wheat into (2) Seeds
Garden Gnome now trades depending on amount of output
Maximum of 64 items will the Garden Gnome provideMinimum of remaining 32 items available is required to be able to trade for a Leather Repair Kit
Unsuccessful trades result in (2) Pumpkin Seeds
Gryphon now plays sound effect (Enderdragon.Wings) when it leapsHarpy now plays sound effect (Enderdragon.Wings) when it leapsMermaid now obtains Restoration (0:05) when touching waterMinotaur model scale increasedNaga now obtains Restoration (0:05) when touching waterSahuagin now obtains Restoration (0:05) when touching waterSiren now obtains Restoration (0:05) when touching waterSpriggan now obtains Slowness and Weakness for (0:05) when on fireSuccubus increased default spawn rate (+2)Witch health increased by 20
Fixed bug with Witch spawning Spider when initially spawned
Wither Cow increased default spawn rate (+2)Yeti model scale increasedYeti now obtains Slowness and Weakness for (0:05)Yuki-Onna now obtains Slowness and Weakness for (0:05)

Mob Drops:
General:
Rewrote rare drop code
Mobs will now only drop one rare drop instead of multiple drops
Level 1 Mobs which drop (1) item have a 1/10 chance to drop this item

Specific:
Baphomet now drops Soulfire instead of Blaze PowderBanshee now drops Soulfire instead of CoalCentaur now drops (1) Meat instead of Meat MorselChochin-Obake drops Soulfire instead of CoalCockatrice now drops Meat Morsel instead of SeedsDullahan now drops (1) Soulfire
Dullahan now only drops Roses
Ghost now drops (1) Soulfire
Ghost now only drops paper
Gnome now drops Seeds instead of Cocoa BeansGryphon now drops Leather instead of Meat MorselMermaid now drops Element of Water instead of Gold ShardsNaga now drops Element of Water instead of MeatSahuagin now drops (1) Element of Water
Sahuagin now only drops Raw/Cooked Fish
Siren now drops Element of Water instead of Raw/Cooked FishSuccubus now drops (1) Fiery Soul
Succubus now only drops Red Mushrooms
Wither Cow now drops Meat Morsel instead of Bones




Version 1.5.1 (1.5.2) Release Fixed bug with Mandrake not being consumed when eaten

Items:
General:
Added Ancient Shovel, Ancient Hoe and Meat Stew

Modified:
Ancient Axe durability halvedAncient Pickaxe durability halvedMandrake is now always edible
Mandrake now inflicts Nausea for (0:10)
Mandrake Stew can now be used 2 times
Mandrake Stew heals 3 hearts per consumption (total of 6 hearts)Mandrake Stew restores 3 hunger per consumption (total of 6 hunger)Mandrake Stew restores 0.4 saturation per consumption (total of 0.8 saturation)Mandrake Stew inflicts Night Vision for (0:60) per consumption

Mobs:
Specific:
Cyan Flower is no longer removed when in PeacefulGarden Gnome now looks at other Garden GnomesGarden Gnome is no longer removed when in Peaceful

Mob Drops:
Specific:
Bone Knight held sword changed to IronCyan Flower has a rare drop of MandrakeSpriggan now has a rare drop of Ancient Shovel instead of Ancient AxeMinotaurus has a rare drop of Ancient AxeNaga has a rare drop of Ancient Hoe
